alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 4:06AM MST until January 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM CREEPING SLOWLY OUT OF NORTHEASTERN COLORADO... .Snow will gradually diminish over the northeast corner of Colorado this morning. Conditions will improve in the Sterling and Akron areas by sunrise, with accumulating snow lingering in Julesburg and Holyoke for a few more hours. Winds gusting up to 40 mph will produce areas of drifting snow. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Fort Morgan, Sterling, and Akron. * WHEN...Snow will diminish to flurries around sunrise. * IMPACTS...Travel may be very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Morgan County; Washington County
